name: All social media and social networks - universal
description: Save your effort, time and storage space on your phone with the application of all social media and social networks for shopping and international sports sites and international news as well as ads, real estate and some educational sites and travel and tourism sites and watching entertainment video sites on your smartphone. Download now and you will not regret.   - Application features of all social media and social networks: -   - Save up to 70% on your phones memory. You do not need to install many social media and social networks as you can provide approximately 140MB on your mobile phone. Quick access to advertising sites like Ebay and Admob and messaging friends via instant messaging.   - Provided with an in-app search engine. For easy access to all social networks and social networks in one application. To enjoy all the social and social networks, shopping, international sports sites, international news as well as ads, real estate and some educational sites on your phone.   - All social media and social networks are locked with a secret number: to keep your information confidential and to prevent information thieves from accessing the accounts of all social networking sites like Quora and linkedIn.  - Sort your favorite sites in a special box.   - All social media and social networks is a free private browser for social media and social networks. The all-in-one social media app displays a lot of social media such as messages that allow you to chat, video calls and send instant messages on social networks. It also provides you with a lot of great shopping sites like Alibaba and Amazon and makes you spend happy times in entertainment sites like YouTube and tiktok and enjoy music and SMS with your loved ones. International sports websites and international news, as well as ads, real estate and some educational sites and fun games on your smartphone.   - You can browse more than 500 social media and social networks for fans of shopping on social media, send messages via Facebook and twitter as well as to display ads from the popular Ebay website and send SMS messages.   - Ease of use: browse all social media, social networks, marketing and social media applications by accessing YouTube. You can also access all instant messaging and ads apps like Adsense, which also allow you to send instant messages to your phone in one app.    - New websites have been added to the media in special sections such as sports and news sites, in addition to shopping sites, many travel and tourism sites, some sites, educational services and real estate sites. Targeting depends on countries and languages.   - In one app for all social media and social networks that includes the most popular sites such as Google and Messenger, explore beautiful pictures and share them with Pinterest. Watch movies on some great sites like Netflix. It also contains the Wattpad website for international novels and stories.  - We are not affiliated with any of the services that can be accessed through this application. We do not have access to your personal data.  - Programs without a website cannot be accessed through this app. Therefore, it must be downloaded to the phone
